Contributor: Morgan, R. G., artist.; Victory Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "R.G. Morgan." Date based on date of the Victory Liberty Loan campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement for the Victory Liberty Loan campaign. The text describes the actions in France of Alan Louis Eggers, Sergeant, M.G. Co., 107th Inf. He received an official citation for his gallantry, which helped to end the war.  By investing in the Victory Liberty Loan, people will do their duty in the same way that Eggers and his platoon did their duty in their fight with the enemy.  The illustration shows the men in the platoon rescuing two men.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Americas immortals : Alan Louis Eggers.
